comment.author: 48623697@N00
comment._content: from boxrec link above: he is only the second fighter in boxing history to have over 200 recorded fights without ever suffering a K0 or TK0 loss, the other was the great Benny Valger! Notable connection: 1926 loss to then up-and-coming Filipino Ceferino Garcia, who would go on to fight the legendary American fighter Henry Armstrong two times (1938, 1940).
